Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND DRUG ABUSE
REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND DRUG ABUSE

Title: Relates to creating the community opioid rehabilitation program services act and the opioid dependency services fund
Summary: Creates the community opioid rehabilitation program services act and the opioid dependency services fund.
LawCode: Amd §§1.03, 19.09 & 41.13, add §41.59, Ment Hyg L; add §97-ssss, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to community opioid rehabilitation program services act; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the opioid dependency services fund
